channel.title: Complete new webclient setup
channel.description:
Hey guys, thanks for taking the time out to read this. Okay, here is what I need help with. I would like someone to help me make a webclient. I have a webhost and what not, that's no trouble. I have tried and tried before to make one, but I seem to have problems with cache downloading, and running the server. Port forwarding is not a problem and i use no-ip too. So, is there someone on the board that is able to help me to create a fully functional webclient that i can just upload to my webpage and host? If it works, and people can connect to it, i will probably pay you a few M rsgp. Source is not a problem, but I would like it to have donator options and easily customaizable messages.
Thank you. :)
